about_the_game:
Dive into the captivating adventure of Blueberry Tales, a narrative game combining exploration and legendary mysteries! You play as Charly, an intrepid young hero who embarks on an extraordinary quest through the varied landscapes of France and Switzerland. Guided by the rumor of the great mage G Milgram and his famous 14 quantum creams with prodigious powers, Charly will have to uncover the secrets of a priceless treasure hidden for centuries.

Along the way, Charly will meet colorful characters, each with their own crazy theories and unique personality. But that's not all: he will learn essential techniques that will help him overcome unexpected challenges and reveal the truth behind the mysterious Discord group, which seems to know much more than it lets on...

Will you be able to solve the puzzles, discover the legendary creams, and open the chest of a thousand riches? Charly's destiny is in your hands in Blueberry Tales, an adventure full of secrets, humor and surprises.

Get ready to explore, solve and triumph. The story begins here!

  • Steam Achievements

  • Free* Soundtrack Included

  • In-game Speedrun Option

  • Integrated Discord RPC and Steam RPC

*Soundtrack is licensed under CC BY-NC-ND

This game was created following G Milgram's treasure hunt.

DO NOT TAKE THIS GAME SERIOUSLY.

Some of the themes discussed, as well as some elements of the lore, may offend some sensibilities. Indeed, the game refers to esoteric concepts and/or pseudo-sciences such as the quantification of objects, geobiology, etc., which can be interpreted in a very personal way. If you are sensitive to these subjects, we invite you to find out more before embarking on the adventure.
